mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRADE_TABLE(TRADE_TITLE, TRADE_NICK, TRADE_CONTENT,TRADE_MONEY, TRADE_AREA, TRADE_CATEGORY) VALUES( #{trade_title},#{trade_nick}, #{trade_content}, #{trade_money}, #{trade_area}, #{trade_category})
mapper.update: UPDATE TRADE_TABLE SET TRADE_TITLE = #{trade_title}, TRADE_MONEY= #{trade_money}, TRADE_CONTENT= #{trade_content} WHERE TRADE_SEQ= #{trade_seq}
UPDATE TRADE_TABLE SET trade_reporting = 1 WHERE TRADE_SEQ= #{trade_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TRADE_TABLE WHERE 1=1 AND TRADE_CATEGORY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCategory} ,'%') ORDER BY trade_seq DESC
SELECT * FROM TRADE_TABLE WHERE 1=1 AND TRADE_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInput} ,'%') ORDER BY trade_seq DESC
SELECT * FROM TRADE_TABLE WHERE 1=1 AND TRADE_NICK LIKE CONCAT('%', #{trade_nick} ,'%') ORDER BY TRADE_NICK DESC
